DIRTYCODE_API uint32_t XmlAttribGetDate ( const char *  pXml,
const char *  pAttrib,
uint32_t  uDefault 
)

Return epoch seconds for a date.

Parameters
pXml- pointer to xml element
pAttrib- name of attribute
uDefault- default value if (pXml == NULL || pAttrib not found)
Returns
uint32_t - attribute value as epoch seconds
Version
01/30/2002 (GWS)

References ds_timetosecs().

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t XmlConvEpoch2Date ( uint32_t  uEpoch,
int32_t *  pYear,
int32_t *  pMonth,
int32_t *  pDay,
int32_t *  pHour,
int32_t *  pMinute,
int32_t *  pSecond 
)

Convert epoch to date components.

Parameters
uEpoch- epoch to convert to date components
pYear- pointer to storage for year
pMonth- pointer to storage for month
pDay- pointer to storage for day
pHour- pointer to storage for hour
pMinute- pointer to storage for minute
pSecond- pointer to storage for second
Returns
int32_t - negative=error, zero=success
Version
01/30/2002 (GWS)

References ds_secstotime().

const char *  _pName 
)

Parameters

_pName- element name (x.y.z notation)
Returns
- Pointer to named element start

DIRTYCODE_API const char* XmlStep ( const char *  _pXml)

Step over tag (regardless of the tab being a start tag or a end tag).

Parameters
*_pXml- pointer to tag opening character
Returns
const char * - pointer to byte following tag closing character or NULL if at end of document
Version
09/16/2010 (jbrookes)
